ing: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or more to taste
des: "This lovely mascarpone icing is incredibly versatile and can be used to decorate a variety of different cakes."
ins: Combine cream, mascarpone cheese, and vanilla extract in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.  Add the sugar gradually and keep mixing until frosting is smooth and stiff peaks form, about 5 minutes.
